REASON.REASON_HEADING: Tell us why you need another date for your jury service
REASON.REASON_HEADING_OB: Tell us why they need another date for their jury service
REASON.ACCEPTABLE_INFO: You must have a good reason for changing, for example:
REASON.ACCEPTABLE_INFO_OB: They must have a good reason for changing, for example:

REASON.ACCEPTABLE_LIST_ITEM_4_OB: their employer will not give them time off work

DATES.HEADING: Choose 3 Mondays when you can start jury service
DATES.HEADING_OB: Choose 3 Mondays when they can start jury service
DATES.GUIDANCE_P2: You must be available to serve at least 2 weeks.
DATES.GUIDANCE_P2_OB: They must be available to serve at least 2 weeks.

CHECK_DATES.HEADING: Check your dates
CHECK_DATES.SUMMARY_HEADING: Dates you can start jury service
CHECK_DATES.SUMMARY_HEADING_OB: Dates they can start jury service
CHECK_DATES.GUIDANCE_P1: You do not need to tell us all other dates you're available.
CHECK_DATES.GUIDANCE_P1_OB: You do not need to tell us all other dates they're available.
CHECK_DATES.GUIDANCE_P2: We'll choose one of your 3 dates.
CHECK_DATES.GUIDANCE_P2_OB: We'll choose one of these 3 dates.
CHECK_DATES.GUIDANCE_P3: In the unlikely event that we cannot use one of these dates, we'll contact you.
CHECK_DATES.QUESTION: Do you want to proceed with these dates?

PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.HEADING: At least one of the Mondays you selected is a bank holiday
PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.GUIDANCE_1: You've selected at least one Monday that's a UK bank holiday.
PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.GUIDANCE_2: If we choose this as your start date, your jury service will start on the Tuesday at the earliest.
PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.GUIDANCE_2_OB: If we choose this as their start date, their jury service will start on the Tuesday at the earliest.
PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.GUIDANCE_3: We'll send you confirmation of your start date.
PUBLIC_HOLIDAY.GUIDANCE_3_OB: We'll send confirmation of the start date.

GUIDANCE_SUMMARY_1: Will I need to serve longer than 2 weeks?
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P1: Most jurors only need to serve 2 weeks.
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P2: You may be asked to serve for longer when you arrive at court.
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P3: If you cannot serve for more than 2 weeks, you'll be able to discuss this with the jury manager at court.
GUIDANCE_SUMMARY_1_OB: Will they need to serve longer than 2 weeks?
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P1_OB: Most jurors only need to serve 2 weeks.
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P2_OB: They may be asked to serve for longer when they arrive at court.
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_1_P3_OB: If they cannot serve for more than 2 weeks, they'll be able to discuss this with the jury manager at court.
GUIDANCE_SUMMARY_2: What if there's a problem nearer the time and I cannot serve?
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_2_P1: You must contact us at that time to let us know.
GUIDANCE_SUMMARY_2_OB: What if there's a problem nearer the time and they cannot serve?
GUIDANCE_DETAIL_2_P1_OB: You or they must contact us at that time to let us know.
